idea:
We provide delightful digital solutions to organizations, businesses, products, and services that look forward to establishing and/or enhance their digital presence — to meet objectives, solve challenges, create opportunities, engage users, and deliver promises.

Powered by creativity and possessed by programming, we are equipped to deliver a broad range of digital solutions: Professional website design & development, web/mobile application design & development, content management system (CMS), digital marketing including SEO, SEM, PPC, Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing (SMM) and cloud storage services.

Our young, multidisciplinary team would be delighted to help you achieve your goals and delight your clients.
name: KAMTI TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
“ Travadda.com”  is the World's First Multidimensional Community Platform and Business Solutions Center for Travel, Tourism & Hospitality Fraternity with a vision to make it a Global Domain-specific Marketplace where the trade Fraternity grows and prospers together.

 

An End-to-end Cost-Efficient solution on Business Process Management through Business Automation and Outsourcing Business Operations for the steady and swift growth of the Organization in the coming future.

 

A 360 degrees Cost-Effective solution for Easy Jobs and Flexi Manpower Sourcing within the industry, along with Domain Centric Serious Business Networking and an Affordable Marketing Platform to reach the targeted audiences.

idea: Verdure Bath PVT LTD is an e-commerce business. Verdurebath.com is the first of its kind. We use our e-commerce website to sell all products from the bathroom industry including CP-Fittings, Sanitary ware, tiles, water heaters, pumps, accessories, bathtubs, steam, and electronic bathroom/hygiene appliances. All these products are of different established brands such as Hindware, Jaquar, etc. as well as our own brand which is known as Verdure. Our products will be sold online through our e-commerce portal
name: VERDURE BATH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Bookmatic Pvt. Ltd. is a fintech company that provides cloud-based invoicing and accounting automation services through OnlineKhata.co.in The company aims to meet the enterprise requirements of the SME industry.

OnlineKhata is the flagship product of Bookmatic Pvt. Ltd., our parent company founded in May 2020, and is the result of 10+ years of passionate engineering backed by intricate domain expertise.
name: BOOKMATIC PRIVATE LIMITED
